dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You will, like, not believe this article I just read. Okay, so, it starts with this massive animatronic eagle, right, then a hologram George Washington selling investment shares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You will, like, not believe this article I just read. Okay, so, it starts with this massive animatronic eagle, right, then a hologram George Washington selling investment shares.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It had everything: glitzy musical acts, rousing speeches, religious devotion, floods of tears, promises of hope, moments of joy, uplifting patriotism, Oprah Winfrey, and lots and lots of balloons.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds pretty standard for, uh, these days. A little jingoistic, maybe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds pretty standard for, uh, these days. A little jingoistic, maybe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, but then Kamala Harris, she's in a gown made from RECYCLED CONFEDERATE FLAGS, and she's talking to an ALIEN FLEET! The Intergalactic Fashion Council, apparently, dictates her style.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, but then Kamala Harris, she's in a gown made from R E C Y C L E D CONFEDERATE F L A G S, and she's talking to an A L I E N F L E E T! The Intergalactic Fashion Council, apparently, dictates her style.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Television commentators marveled at the way Vice President Kamala Harris presented herself: her smile, her body language, her voice, even her choice of clothing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Confederate flags. Aliens. You know, I've heard worse fanfiction plots, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Confederate flags. Aliens. You know, I've heard worse fanfiction plots, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And get this! H.L. Mencken, cloned, he says America's an interplanetary reality show because of mind control in our TVs!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this! H.L. Mencken, cloned, he says America's an interplanetary reality show because of mind control in our TVs!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The caustic American journalist H.L. Mencken, who despised politicians and thought most Americans were ignorant oafs, was a great observer of political party conventions. He wrote in 1927: The United States, to my eye, is incomparably the greatest show on earth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. So, the reason people are obsessed with celebrity gossip is, uh, mind control. Not just, you know, being nosey. Revolutionary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. So, the reason people are obsessed with celebrity gossip is, uh, mind control. Not just, you know, being nosey. Revolutionary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the Queen of England, right? A CLONE of Elizabeth II, she's a LIZARD PERSON! And the BBC is, like, secretly filming her eating live mice to, um, maintain her form!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the Queen of England, right? A C L O N E of Elizabeth I I, she's a L I Z A R D P E R S O N! And the B B C is, like, secretly filming her eating live mice to, um, maintain her form!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Queen Elizabeth II allowed the BBC to document her domestic life, from barbecues in the garden to tea with the children. She felt that she had to come down to earth to remain popular.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Lizard people. Next you'll tell me they're putting chemicals in the water to turn the frogs gay. Old news, B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Lizard people. Next you'll tell me they're putting chemicals in the water to turn the frogs gay. Old news, B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Oscar speeches, they're mandatory endorsements for this Universal Happiness Initiative, and winners thank, like, government-appointed happiness counselors!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Oscar speeches, they're mandatory endorsements for this Universal Happiness Initiative, and winners thank, like, government-appointed happiness counselors!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Foreign recipients of an Oscar, for example, tend to keep acceptance speeches crisp and short. Not the American stars, who must tearfully thank everyone from their primary schoolteachers to their pet dogs, and express their deep devotion to humanity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So the speeches got even more boring and fake. Hard to imagine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the speeches got even more boring and fake. Hard to imagine.

dialogue_turns.text: And the DNC! It's a front for genetically modified popcorn to distract from the ZORPIAN EMPIRE INVASION! Led by Zorp the Magnificent!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the D N C! It's a front for genetically modified popcorn to distract from the Z O R P I A N E M P I R E I N V A S I O N! Led by Zorp the Magnificent!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There was a lot of talk at the Democratic National Convention of Americans looking out for each other, loving their neighbors, and helping the poor and marginalized.

dialogue_turns.text: Zorp the Magnificent. Seriously? Popcorn. Yeah. That tracks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it ends with this colossal golden Oprah statue for interdimensional travelers and "free vaccine stations" that are, uh, mind-altering procedures! Mind ALTERING!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it ends with this colossal golden Oprah statue for interdimensional travelers and free vaccine stations that are, uh, mind-altering procedures! Mind A L T E R I N G!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: What we see, then, at the party convention and the Oscar ceremony, in the television interview and the magazine profile, is the performance of authenticity. In the right hands, as was the case in Chicago, this can indeed look like the greatest show on earth.
